text: Paul Barrere (July 3, 1948 â€“ October 26, 2019) was an American guitarist. He was a member of the band Little Feat, which he joined in 1972. Barrere died on October 26, 2019 at the age of 71 in Los Angeles, California of liver cancer. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Musicians from Burbank, California Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Burbank, California Category:20th-century American guitarists
title: Paul Barrere
